```{r}
multiply_by_5 <- function(x){
  x * 5
}
multiply_by_5(2)
```

```{r}
multiply_by <- function(x, y){
  z <- x * y
  z
}

multiply_by(2, 10)
```

```{r}
multiply_by <- function(x, y = 3){
  z <- x * y
  z
}
multiply_by(x = 2)
```

###scope

```{r}
n <- 8
multiply_by_n <- function(x)
  x * n
multiply_by_n(2)
```



```{r}
n <- 8
multiply_by_n <- function(x, n)
  x * n
multiply_by_n(2, 9)
```

```{r}
multiply_by_n <- function(x, n){
  ans <- x * n
    if(ans %% 2 == 1){
      z <- (paste("x is odd"))
    } else {
    z <- (paste("x is even"))
  }
 z
}
multiply_by_n(3, 3)
```
